website_summaries.verdict: A quality keyboard with a versatile and protective leather case.
pros: The Nulaxy keyboard is lightweight, despite being made out of sturdy metal
The magnet on the case is strong, to the point we suggest keeping your credit cards away from it
They keyboard pairs with iPhone and Android devices as well
We loved the customizable folds that the case provided – a larger fold to support an iPad, and a smaller fold to support your phone
cons: The charger is not included, but this keyboard is compatible with many phone chargers

website_summaries.verdict: This easy-to-use Bluetooth keyboard includes a bonus case that can double as a tablet stand.
pros: Compatible with iOS, Android, and Windows
Rechargeable lithium battery lasts up to 60 days between charges
The included magnetic closure leather case can also be used as a stand for your tablet
cons: Some keys are placed a little too closely, which can make it a little difficult to type

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Bother
customer_reviews.text: Its okay I suppose, but I rather regret getting it. First it's just Too small. Which I guess if you're just using it for facebook or other nonsense it's fine, but definitely not good for working. The keys also have a habit of being unresponsive, especially if you type fast. And one of them has already gotten stuck repeating itself. I blame this on a lag issue, the keyboard takes a second to register the keys. Also it frequently loses connection for no reason. Seems to keep a good charge though. So if you want something just to mess around with, it's good enough for that. If you actually need a keyboard for typing though, this is pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've had this keyboard for nearly a year, and have only charged it 3 times, when I use it nearly every day. I have no idea how long this things battery is supposed to last, but it's never given me an indication that it was failing so it's exceptional. I've had no issues with any of the keys in all the time I've had it unlike other portable keyboards, so this gets a 5/5 rating just from that. It's very easy to use, has a great magnetic cover and the stand works great for school either on a desk, or in my lap. If I need another mobile keyboard, I'll buy another one of these, because it's very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: After about 3 months it started skipping certain characters when I typed. Always the same ones, though there is nothing physically wrong with the keyboard. I took excellent care of it, keeping it in a case I purchased to protect it, and never dropped or spilled anything on it. I used it about 20 times before this started to happen. I was pairing it with my iPad Pro. I recommend against purchasing this product. There are other options out there.
customer_reviews.author: ClaudineBeatrice

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, laggy, inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I am a touchhtypist and am writin this reiewwith the keyboard. Asyou cansee the accuracy ofthekeyboard isless then desirableMan times key strokes arenot capturedor thereisa terrible lag in the caracters appearing n the screen I spend way too mch time bak spacing or dleting characterss to make this worthwile. It's etremely frustratingad I end up resorting to untig d pcking insted of toucchtypig Additionally Inotiedtoy thatthe botto of the keyboard i starting to bubble or seperate .Inever thought Iwould prefer the softeyboard toaphysical keeybaord u this isjust terrible I guess it's good for freeing up screen space thatwould betaken up by the onscreen keyboard?
customer_reviews.author: Joe A Zucco

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself the money and frustration
customer_reviews.text: This thing didn't last six months. 1. At least two keys are sticking, meaning I get long strings of characters. 2. At least 3 CAPS no longer work. 3. It disconnects from Bluetooth every 30 seconds. It actually worked pretty well the first month. Downhill after that.
customer_reviews.author: Splorer

customer_reviews.title: Seemed fine at first
customer_reviews.text: Seemed fine at first, but then developed an issue where only the backspace key would work until the keyboard was restarted, then would work for a minute and the problem would come back. I really wanted to like it, it's convenient and seemingly well built, but it seems i'm not the only one with this problem. A keyboard that doesn't type is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Ford

customer_reviews.title: Was great
customer_reviews.text: I loved this keyboard when I first got it, super portable, very easy to use and wasn't cramped like most Bluetooth keyboards. The battery life on this keyboard is unreal, it lasts forever! I only had to charge it once every 2 weeks. It also connects extremely fast and automatically to my iPad making it probably one of the easiest and least frustrating keyboards I've ever used. However, the space bar, B, N, and H keys stopped working randomly one day and I've only had it for a few months. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Shaelyn

customer_reviews.title: A small learning curve.
customer_reviews.text: You might need a little time to get used to the fact that this keyboard is a little smaller than a normal sized keyboard. That being said, I love this thing! This keyboard has changed the entire way I think about my phone. I've always used my mobile notepad to write short stories, lyrics, poetry, etc. This keyboard actually helps me focus, and in turn, my artistic qualities can flourish. If you think there's a small chance you MIGHT one day MAYBE need this keyboard...get it now! You will be glad you have it when you need it. Just to be clear, I've ONLY used this on my Android phone. I have no clue how it works with an iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Race

customer_reviews.title: A beauty of a product. Slim and easy to carry. Syncs beautifully with Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: This elegant piece of equipment is not only aesthetically pleasing but works like a charm. After charging, it pairs up easily with anything that uses Bluetooth, notably my iPhone. I can place the phone and keyboard in front of me and easily peck away with little trouble. Sometimes I fly or take a train and need to either write documents or respond to a plethora of emails to make myself useful. Using the keyboard is way easier than using the phone keyboard where I often poke the wrong keys. This product comes with a nice leather cover, is slim and unassuming and yes, I enjoy using it!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 60 days (10 uses)
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine up till now. I have the keyboard fully charged, never dropped it, nor spilled anything on it and it just stopped working. With the high ratings, I really expected it to work well especially with such few uses! What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Cici

customer_reviews.title: Switching between devices does not work
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is fine with a single paired device. Unfortunately the switching function between multiple devices does not work. I was able to toggle between Windows and Android a couple of times after fighting with it for a while, but it was very short lived. Now both devices show that they are paired to the keyboard, but I have to unpair and reconnect in order to actually use it. Switching between devices is the primary feature that interested me, so I'm pretty disappointed. Other than that, the magnetic cover does a good job at supporting my phone upright and the keys feel nice. I do wish it had a trackpad.
customer_reviews.author: MKimma

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Bluetooth Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and connect with my several devices. Nice soft keypad and attractive leather case. BEWARE: Although the product is great, someone from nulaxy or someone posing as nulaxy will email you and offer you a free product if you write a review and send them a snap shot. They then will tell you that they are located overseas and cannot ship to you directly and will ask you for your PayPal account for them to reimburse you after YOU buy the product from Amazon. Beware, Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good small sized keyboard but lacks some features
customer_reviews.text: This is a good small keyboard that you can use at home or on the road. There are a couple of things that need improvements. 1) There is a time lag between when you type and when the words/letters start showing up in the computer. This often happens when you have not used the keyboard for several minutes. 2) Some key buttons, such as the delete and print screen buttons, are not available on this keyboard. If they can come up with ways to use these missing keys that are available on regular keyboards, that would be great. Overall, I am pleased with this keyboard though.
customer_reviews.author: Resperance

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Windows RDP on iPad
customer_reviews.text: Setup was very easy. Excellent Keyboard layout. REALLY good if running a Windows application on an iOS device. All the standard Windows keys are supported in a logical way. The escape key is Fn-Esc. Can't yet speek to battery life or durability, but it looks well made. The tiny manual can fit on single 8X10 shhet of paper and that is all you need. No Phd or hours of configuration required. Folding stand is very clever with magnetic attachments. Only downside is it requires a flat surface to setup.
customer_reviews.author: John Santmann

customer_reviews.title: Could have been great
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. Connected each time without fail. The keyboard itself is light and sleek. The leather cover is great; it feels good and the fold up system works well holding up my phone and table. But the keyboard itself is just way too cramped. I have a small hand, but I still had difficulties navigating. Wven after a couple of days of constant use, I kept on pressing on wrong buttons and the Delete button was just too small. The keys are not as soft and quiet as described. There is a definite clacky/rattly noise. If not for this, I would have just kept it and try to get used to the cramped keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeman Leigh

customer_reviews.title: They're super tiny, a third of one key
customer_reviews.text: Connects well, types kind of loud. I don't really use the stand because I have a case that does it already. I'm still trying to get used to the size of the numerical keys above the letters. They're super tiny, a third of one key. --update-- The keyboard no longer charges. I've tried several times. I can't use it anymore. Bought it two months ago. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: abo shi

customer_reviews.title: The desk real estate this needs kills the deal
customer_reviews.text: Please be aware that this keyboard will take a lot of desk space to use due to the design. I find it takes more space than k480 from logitech. The keyboard by itself is not that smaller than K480 either. At the same time, it's not as light as you might think. I think the build quality is excellent given the price, but again, the desk space it needs kills the deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Received an open box item, many keys don't work
customer_reviews.text: I received the keyboard yesterday. The seal on the keyboard package has been cut open when I received it. I tried the keyboard on my Fire 10hd. They paired ok. The backspace and arrow keys always respond, but the letter/number /space keys don't always respond, especially after backspace is used. Though I can make them respond by first hitting the arrow key then the letter/ number keys, this is not what a normal product is supposed to be. Did they send me an open box defective product? Will return it, though I like its cover. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This keyboard is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is great!! It’s super easy to connect, the keys are comfortable and the battery life is fantastic. The case is super slim and can be easily carried in a purse. The foldout stand shape it morphs into when opened supports my bulky phone case and heavy older phone easily. In terms of function, even when using it with a phone the easy to remember quick functions (like using emojis) are fast. I still can’t believe such a great little device only cost me about $20! I highly recommend this keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: miscetc1

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a month
customer_reviews.text: Well, I’ve tried four different brands of keyboards trying to find one that lasts more than a year and I’m starting to think most of these have a very short lifespan. It does connect but the backspace and enter keys no longer function and you kind of need those. I was going to try to return it but I went 4 days over the return period. Out of the ones I tried I actually did have one that lasted about a year by Omotion so I’ll cross my fingers and try that one again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price point
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a new Bluetooth keyboard for my iPad. Purchasing a new iPad case with a built in keyboard would not have suited my needs, thankfully I stumbled onto this little gem. It is light, takes up very little space, and comes with its own magnetic case which can double as a stand for my tablet. Typing on it is feels as natural to me as any other keyboard I have ever used. Well worth the money. I personally don’t need to use this across multiple devices, so I cannot say one way or the other how that particular feature works. However, for me this is a five star product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Good... but not great
customer_reviews.text: Great, but accidentally bought the wrong one with no backlit keys. Guess I couldn’t tell the 2 apart when purchasing which was quite annoying. But, build quality is ehhh, but for the money I can’t expect high quality items. Bluetooth works fine with no disconnection issues. It is a small keyboard and a bit difficult to type with sometimes and the delete key in my opinion is too small. But, feedback is good and for the money I can’t really see a better option. I have it 4 stars because I do tend to get a bit annoyed with backspace key but other than that it a solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Pairs well with our school iPads.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one, with school from home both my boys needed to have one available. We've been using the first on and off for over two years and it's been great. The battery life is amazing, the kids didn't touch it all summer long then turned it on at the start of school with their reissued iPad and got to work without a hitch. We've added a bluetooth mouse to the mix now and they both function great at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: E and the Boys

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So, this is a day-1 review. I bought this for school to accompany my 2018 iPad 6th Gen. My options included: -Buy a MacBook (can’t justify spending that much money when I already have an iPad and a Mac Mini). -Use my husband’s Lenovo Yoga (I would rather buy a MacBook than have to use Windows software). -Buy a Bluetooth keyboard. I wanted a keyboard case, but I couldn’t find any that held an Apple Pencil and still had decent reviews. I like that this keyboard folds up into its own little case. I’ll update my review in a few months to let you all know how the keyboard has held up.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle, Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is amazing, having connectivity issues.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a year and 1/2 ago and have only had to charge it twice! The battery life is amazing. I am in class M-F 7:30a to 6, and when you factor in study time - I use this keyboard a good amount. I love how this is an option not attached to my iPad. You can lift keyboard from the magnetic case to clean. However for the past 3-4 months, it hasn’t stayed connected to my iPad! I am now constantly having to ‘forget device’ and reconnect . It’s been annoying. Not sure if I’ve just reach the end of the life span for this product. :(
customer_reviews.author: Turtey

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Very plasticky and clattery when typing. Kinda flexible so hard to use on my lap. Connectivity is weird and at least tonight when I was using it I had to go in to my Bluetooth settings each time it disconnected to manually reconnect. Just not terribly user friendly. The case is cool tho, and it’s honestly quite a bit higher quality than a lot of other offerings in this vein. Still, not my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Salemka

customer_reviews.title: Great typing feel, convenient phone/tablet stand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keyboard to help journaling on my android phone app. So far, I love the "clickety-clack" mechanical feel. It helps with typing accuracy and speed. Pairing was simple. The brown leatherette cover looks sophisticated and folds into a very convenient stand for my phone. I can even type in bed with the keyboard+phone in my lap, just like a laptop. I chose this over another compact bluetooth keyboard because the the other layout was hard to get used to and didn't have an integrated phone stand. No feedback on battery life because I just got it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Slick black shell makes the keyboard look great. Keys works as they should. Some keys are a bit smaller than what I would like but it does the job it was intended for. The outside, magnetic case was definitely a plus. The folding part which holds the iPad is a bit weaker than I'd hope for no matter how you fold it, but I fixed that right up with a mini binder clip. Overall, good buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: A real opinion

customer_reviews.title: Fine Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Good keyboard - the included case is nicely designed, however the magnet that holds the sides together to form the support for the iPad could be stronger, they sometimes split apart and takes several attempts to set up. once up and the weight of the ipad is against it, I have not had any issues with it coming apart. The case leather does have a bit of an "off" smell, but it faded in a day or two. Overall ok for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TJT

customer_reviews.title: VERY good keyboard. Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Took me a bit to sort out how to use the cover as a stand. Clever design. I've had this type of keyboard before, but never one that is nearly as good. After a few minutes it was as easy to type on it as it is on my lap top. I use it primarily with my smart phone. I no longer need to pay for the monthly fee on my tablet. This keyboard makes travel typing with a phone as easy as with a tablet! Takes up a lot less room, too.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough to support my iPad Pro 12.9"
customer_reviews.text: The keys are quiet, the battery life is great, and the bluetooth connectivity and setup were a breeze. This really is a good keyboard, it just doesn't fit my needs because the magnets that should hold the tablet holder are not strong enough to support my iPad Pro 12.9". Perhaps I got a bad unit, but I don't want to mess with trying multiple times to get this thing to work as I had hoped it would.
customer_reviews.author: Teknurd

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  It's way nicer than I imagined.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic keyboard. I use it with my iPhone and iPad, both running iOS 12. It's worthwhile to spend 10 minutes to play with the "special keys" (option, control, win, fn) to see what they do. Many iPad apps will show you special key commands if you hold down the "win" key. The stand looks cheesy in the photos. But in real life it is very awesome. I was put off by the stand in the photos, but it is a thoughtfully engineered, elegant and simple stand. In all, I am yet another reviewer giving this keyboard a well-deserved 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Larns

customer_reviews.title: Great little keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use with my work phone since I often times have to fill out forms online for service issues. So far it has been outstanding and the fact that it has a magnetic bottom was an added benefit since I can store the keyboard on my center console in my work van securely. The keys are comfortable to type with and everything was easy to set up as well. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lamb0985

customer_reviews.title: Lousy product.  Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Lousy product. The fold together tabs dont stay folded if you have a tablet bigger that 8 in. The only thing t hat holds them together is friction from a table. If the table is anywhere slick like a kitchen table or an wooden desk the tablet will fall. After 1st use it won't pair either . Tablet just says "unable to connect. Not a lot of money a waste of money when much better products are available.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Delete, delete, delete
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. overall, good product. One glaring flaw. No delete key. Sorry, but I make mistakes and also like to heavily edit my writing. Lack of a delete key means using the arrows to get behind words and then backspace. Not since I used a typewriter have I had a keyboard without a delete key. A small, simple thing to rectify, but the lack of the delete key slows down my work. Will probably buy a different keyboard...after checking the keys carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Paul P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent accessory for travel and on-the-go
customer_reviews.text: Recently I have started leaving my larger laptop at home and taking my iPad when I travel. While I appreciate the smaller size, typing on the screen has been less than convenient. I decided to take a chance on this portable Bluetooth keyboard from Nulaxy and I am so glad I did! It is the perfect size and weight for travel. It fits right in my iPad case. I also love that it has its own cover to project the keys. The stand holds my devices at a perfect height for viewing. Highly recommended product that has made using my devices on the go much easier and more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria B

customer_reviews.title: Count on it missing about 1 in 10 letters entered.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to only work part of the time. About two words per sentence I have to backspace because it missed one of the keys that I entered. To me it’s virtually worthless because the time that I was hoping to save by having a keyboard is lost by having to go back and make corrections for missing letters.
customer_reviews.author: Dizzo

customer_reviews.title: Absolute need for tech savy
customer_reviews.text: Small, light weight and absolutely stylish that would make your "meeting accessory stack" look so professional! I'm use to type in regular PC's mechanical keyboards, so switching back and forth between the 2 keyboards - one regular, one small, might take a bit of time to get used to. I get used to that pretty quickly. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Linh D.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several iPads, cases with keyboards, etc. through the years. I can say this keyboard is fantastic. The key response when typing is great. The key spacing and sizing is on point. It works perfectly between my current iPhone and iPad with no issues. I can’t speak to battery performance as I have yet to have to charge the keyboard, although in all fairness I just got it. But in terms of the use of the keyboard it is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nifty little keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice size. Mimics my laptop computer very closely (which, along with price, is why I chose this wireless keyboard.) Easy to pair with Samsung tablet. Case is nice, strong magnets. Very slim, lightweight, will be convenient for travel. Nice to have this option for using with tablet, since on screen keyboard isn't as quick or accurate for more lengthy typing. The price is right. I am happy with this purchase and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shan M.

customer_reviews.title: Almost to small
customer_reviews.text: Very nice keyboard I bought for my sons mission. Works well but very small. Many will find it comfortable to use but if you have big hands you will not like it at all. I am 5'10" and 180 lbs and find it to small for typing comfortably. It is better than just using your thumbs. After purchasing I realized that the keyboard is much smaller than a lot of the other portable keyboards available.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: It works fine after you get used to it.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the way it works with the magnet on the folding cover. It needed a break in time to fold easier. The magnets were not strong enough in the first day or two to hold the weight of the tablet. Now it works fine. I only miss a bigger key for backspace and there is no delete key either. The enter key could also be bigger... Overall it adds more functionality when typing on the tablet.
customer_reviews.author: rleao

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and portable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blue tooth keyboard. I have an android based tablet that I am using it with, but it will also work with Apple products. It comes in a leather case that folds back and acts as a stand. It's portable and will easily fit into a purse or bag. I haven't used it at any great distance yet. Can't even think of a reason why I would need to. But I have to catalog many items. So it is easier to bring just the keyboard with me throughout the room instead of lugging the tablet too. Give it a try. I think you'll like it too!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Greatbut
customer_reviews.text: Itworkedgreatforjustoverayearandnowthespacebardoesntworkandtheshiftkeyeither.alsothearroweys.hwoeverididlikeitwhenitwasworking1. Update: Nulaxy reached out and gave me a 10% discount on the new back lit one I purchased to replace this one. The new one comes with a free replacement for 60 days and 18 month warranty after that whereas the first one just 30 days
customer_reviews.author: Brittney A

customer_reviews.title: Great Illumination and Shortcuts
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is great to type with, but not as good as an expensive mechanical keyboard. What I really love is the illumination and the helpful shortcut keys. Using the keyboard, I can easily change my Android phone's screen brightness, search on Google, change volume, jump to the Home screen or control the music. I also like the leather-feel case and the way it snugly folds around the keyboard or magnetically folds to prop up my phone or keyboard. Did I mention the great price? This is a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Dunay

customer_reviews.title: Small and compact, perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this keyboard for my new IPad Pro. My first impression is, this exactly what I was hoping for. I can’t give much feed back about the battery life, but it’s very easy to set up and pair with the tablet and typing is easy enough. The case was a big plus for me, it gives me an extra stand if needed and protection for the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: It's OK, just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Nice concept with the magnetic folding base/cover, but the keyboard itself didn't have a good feel to me. A couple keys kept getting stuck. Another minor point, was that it took 2 key pressed at same time to go to "home" or cycle back to previous screen on my ipad, because this keyboard is made for both i-pad/mac and android. I now use a keyboard more friendly to the "i"... and I also decided I like the keyboard to be backlit, a feature not available on this keyboard. I returned it, and Amazon & seller gave me full refund.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeNY

customer_reviews.title: Good for just bluetooth keyboard but it doesn't hold ipad ...
customer_reviews.text: Got today. Good for just bluetooth keyboard but it doesn't hold ipad nicely so can't use keeping it on the lap. Won't be much of use outside my room. But i already got desktop and laptop in my room. Although it look nice piece of device, not so useful in daily use. Personally not happy with purchase. This is the disadvantage of buying online, you don't know if you like the item or not until you get the delivery. Wish i could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Shail59

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed no lighted keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: This model does not have a lighted keyboard, even though it is the KM12 model. The paperwork that came with the keyboard indicates how to turn on the light but it does not work. I like the look and feel of the keyboard and stand/cover, but am feel a little deceived, or rather disappointed, that the keyboard does not light up.
customer_reviews.author: M Castleton

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard, very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I am going on an extended trip and didn't want to lug my big, heavy, aging laptop on a long trip with questionable internet and power access, so I bought this for my tablet so I can write while I travel. It is sturdy, functional, comfortable to use and feels surprisingly durable. I was dubious about the "tablet stand" feature of the case but it works very well. The great thing is I can bring my power bank and charge it if I need to on the go. I plan on using this baby heavily on the plane. It's easy to set up the Bluetooth using the instructions included. It took maybe 2 minutes, with reading the instructions included.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great little keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first bluetooth keyboard I've owned ... and bought it for my iPad (2017 edition) ... worked flawlessly right out of the package. Battery life seems to last too ... I charged it initially and have not charged it again... I've not used it a whole lot but just sitting it holds the charge! The smaller key surface is hard to get used to but it's nice to have when needed on the road or working on something that requires typing when using iPad (email replies, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Best.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this keyboard. Hooked up to my Oneplus 3. No lag, very smooth keyboard, keys big enough to feel like regular sized keyboard. Bluetooth disconnects from the phone every 15 minutes of inactivity, but as soon as you start typing, it will reconnect and better yet, it will dump what all you typed on to the screen!. I love this and planning on gifting this to friends and family as I am sure they love it too!.
customer_reviews.author: rAma

customer_reviews.title: Everything it was promised to be - brilliant design!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it folds up to nothing, expands to a brilliant resting place for your device! Makes for a perfect work station! I'm so DONE with SWYPE, and Android's insertion of the wrong word(s) no matter how you configure your keyboard settings - whether your phone's keyboard is form your phone's manufacturer, from Google, or any third-party keyboard developer you want to try. A manual keyboard is the only way to be productive and maintain some semblance of sanity - and THIS keyboard is fabulous! Has s great feel and nice "click" to the buttons!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Portable Bluetooth Keyboard!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bluetooth keyboard feels very premium! It comes attached with a nice leather cover that doubles as a stand for a tablet or a phone. The keyboard buttons have decent travel, the keyboard has a nice textured feel to it, and the leather cover gives it a professional look. This product is great for college students who want to bring a light-weight tablet instead of a bulky laptop to class. It works with practically any device since it is compatible with iOS, Android, Mac, and Windows.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Le

customer_reviews.title: Portable good keyboard, but small
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have expected it to be small but not _this_ small. Truth is I'm happy though because I wanted something small and portable. I have a Galaxy Note 9 and sometimes it's just easier to take that out to breakfast or to meetings and work on it with the keyboard. Since it's so small I make a lot of mistakes but if I look at the keyboard I don't make mistakes and I can type just as fast. Should have gotten the back lit way. For $8 more would have been worth it, oh well. Still satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Connects instantly.
customer_reviews.text: Like the title says, it connects instantly; after the initial setup, just turn on and start typing. It takes getting used to such tiny keys, but it works fine. attached case seems to offer good protection. Have not tried to use the case as a stand, since my tablet is in a rugged case with a kickstand.
customer_reviews.author: Gr8ful_k

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected, but really small
customer_reviews.text: This is way to small for me, even though I am used to using a laptop keyboard. That being said, my wife likes it. She uses it with 2 Iphones, an Ipad, and an Android OS phone. Although it occasionally loses the connecting, it isn't so frequent that she's thrown it at me. For her, I would buy it again. For me, I would never buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Honking Goose

customer_reviews.title: The switching between ios to windows are bad. I have a windows tablet and an iphone
customer_reviews.text: The switching between ios to windows are bad. I have a windows tablet and an iphone. My iphone kept hogging the keyboard even if I pressed the switch function. It's not going to bug me much since I'll be using it for my windows tablet. The magnet cover is very useful to put it in bag as protection and it serves as a tablet stand.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this bluetooth keyboard and grateful to the seller and Amazon. It’s small and light but not too small or flimsy light to the point that I feel discomfort typing. It’s convenient to stick in my purse as I like using it to type longer emails on my cellphone. Love the brown faux-leather look. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sovanny

customer_reviews.title: no charger included
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up and I believe a good value for the price. I was not aware that it did not come with a charger. I feel that should be included. It works well. The magnet to stand the tablet up weakens rather quickly, but overall it's a good keyboard. I would give it a 4 if it came with a charger.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Too small. Not what I wanted/needed
customer_reviews.text: I returned this. I didn't check in to the posted dimensions well enough. I wanted something closer to a full sized keyboard. I make too many typo errors with these smaller keyboards. It just wasn't what I wanted/needed.
customer_reviews.author: Julitx715

customer_reviews.title: Got this for remote learning for my kid
customer_reviews.text: During this time, my children are using their iPad to attend school and to do homework. I bought this so they didn’t need to use the screen to type which took up half of the screen. This is a nice design. The cover of the keyboard can become a stand for the iPad. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This item was shipped to me fast and packaged very well. First thing I noticed was the Bluetooth connection was very good. I like the size and feel of the item. The cover serves as a good purpose for the keyboard. This idea was well implemented, which I am happy about. Typing is very easy and the clicks on letters gives it a good feel. Very light weight as well. Only 4 star, bc I wish there was a gauge to know when the battery is running low or if it needs charging.
customer_reviews.author: I'm J. :)

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I have been using it for a while and I have no complaints! It makes typing on my iPad so much easier and faster, allowing me much more freedom instead of bringing my heavy laptop OR not being able to keep up between my thoughts and my fingers!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good keyboard at a great price. I love it! It works well, is light weight, has a variable slant adjustment for any use and is multi-use (Apple, Windows or Android). I have only had it for a couple weeks. But its the most convenient keyboard I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Mpanciro

customer_reviews.title: Versatile & good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this keyboard! It is so versatile and easy to set up & use (as opposed to the video showing a customer fumbling all over the place trying to set it up). The only thing preventing a 5-star review is that it is not as sturdy for my iPad Air 2 when propped up in the vertical direction. I had also thought the picture showed an iPad fitting totally inside the keyboard case. It does not. So.... off to buy a small case for the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: D Dee

customer_reviews.title: It pairs up with my ipad mini quick and easy. The keys are responsive and space well enough ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this keyboard for awhile now and it is working flawlessly. It pairs up with my ipad mini quick and easy. The keys are responsive and space well enough for a small keyboard. It seems durable, no problems as yet. It has good battery life and the stand is sturdier than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny & Christen

customer_reviews.title: Worked once when I recieved it, and never again after that.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard paired successfully with my iPad and worked reasonably well. When I charged it, I noticed the red charge light never turned off, it seemed to be continuously charging even overnight. I assumed it would still work, but it's completely dead and unable to hold a charge or turn on while it's plugged in and receiving power. I passed the return window on this and regret the purchase, as this charging issue indicates cheap components that easily fail. Purchase another bluetooth keyboard over this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nato

customer_reviews.title: Excellent keyboard. Nice carrying case
customer_reviews.text: Excellent keyboard. Nice carrying case, which is great for supporting a phone or ipad. Small size is ideal for portability, but still large enough for typing comfortably. Very easy to pair with both my laptop (Thinkpad) and my iPad. Keyboard shipped fast. On arrival, package was open and charging cord was missing. However the company replied to my inquiry right away and shipped a new charging cable, no questions asked (and this also arrived in two days!). Wonderful customer service! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mag

customer_reviews.title: Amazing size and battery life
customer_reviews.text: Bought this keyboard for my iPad mini and liked that i didn't have to keep it attached to my iPad but it also had a place for it to stand and it became its own case! It is so lightweight and i use it to type my homework in google docs. It pairs quickly and all the buttons are responsive. I loved it so much, I recommended it to my mother in law and she loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Rivera

customer_reviews.title: best value for money, lasting battery and great bluetooth pairing
customer_reviews.text: this keyboard is so value for money! i use it with my ipad pro 11” and it’s amazing. been using it over 2 months now and i’ve only charged it once (full 8h) when i got it. i turn it on only when i use it, which is maybe 2-3 full days a week. it’s light, and easy to carry. detachable from case and bluetooth works great. super good buy that i bought an extra one for my dad. the keys click so well compared to the really expensive ipad smart folio (refused to get that because of the keys and price). i’m still getting to know the keyboard shortcuts though the basic ones are definitely there.
customer_reviews.author: cordelia

customer_reviews.title: I'm Loving it.
customer_reviews.text: Great little keyboard. I use it for reports that I don't want to type on my screen, it's nice to have a physical keyboard now and then. The cover flips around and can hold up the tablet if needed, or can flip underneath and provide a small area for wrists to sit on while typing. It's very cool for the price. Recharges and stays charged a long time. Thin and light if you need to throw it in a bag for travel.
customer_reviews.author: kevin b lee

customer_reviews.title: Simple, effective and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I'm not usually impressed by these inexpensive things on amazon. This keyboard though is phenomenal. Connection: lightning fast, simple Battery Life: Amazing Keylag: None Durability: No issues with quality Turns my phone into a tiny tablet for note taking at work
customer_reviews.author: Michael Shawe

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to review this because I haven’t been able to get it to connect. I bought this for my sons iPad couldn’t get it to connect. Actually exchanged it thinking it was the keyboard but still can’t get the new one to connect. If I still can’t get it to connect here soon I’ll probably return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good.  I may try a larger keyboard in the future...
customer_reviews.text: Good price, keys feel OK, case is nice. Overall I’m happy. This is pretty much my first Bluetooth keyboard for a tablet. It is small of course, even though i have Trump-like hands, it’s not super easy to type very well, of course maybe over time I’ll improve.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Case, Input Lag
customer_reviews.text: The input lag on the keyboard is horrendous. But if that wasn't bad enough, the case, which is designed to hold up a device like an iPad, does so with the aid of magnets. Unfortunately, the magnets on my item weren't strong enough, and the case kept coming apart. I don't feel confident having an expensive tablet lean up against the case and initiated a return.
customer_reviews.author: McNeill

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but when using it as a tablet stand, viewing angle is not ideal
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Serves its purpose. Only thing I don't like is the steep angle my tablet sits at. When typing, the tablet is pointing at my chest, not my eyes, and there is no way to adjust the angle. You can just fold the keyboard cover under and not use it for a tablet stand, propping your tablet on something else. You can't remove the cover because the keyboard is glued to it.
customer_reviews.author: Broke in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Great little keyboard 👌
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard with good quality casing. Is sturdy and light weight. Bluetooth connectivity doesn’t take much time. Easy to carry around. Has great support for tab and phone. Works better when placed on table. Good sensitive keyboard. Comes with user manual and a charging cable. Would definitely recommend this keyboard. It Doesn’t have a touch pad which was little off, other than that this keyboard is worth the money 👍
customer_reviews.author: M and DK

customer_reviews.title: great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: sometime the keys stick but I don't think you could expect less from such a small keyboard. I use this with my kindle fire and it works great. I fully charged it once and the battery has lasted a very long time. If you expect this to be a regular size keyboard, you will be disappointed. If you expect this to be and work like a small keyboard, you'll be happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Fultz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing high quality prouduct!
customer_reviews.text: I used this prouduct to write on my iPad, & it was perfect size! It was perfect lap size for when you want to lounge around, or perfect size to set on a table. It easily foldable to put away or later or to fold & use as a stand at a table. I love how it’s bluetooth so it’s no handle to plug in, & quickly & easly connects. Holds an AMAZING charge, lasts more than an hour like most products do! Helped writing go faster, felt completely like my iPad was a laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Harper

customer_reviews.title: Great value keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The case sets it apart from similar keyboards with the ability to use as a stand for your tablet while packing away the keyboard when traveling. Only negative so far is the angle you can place the tablet is a little too steep. A flatter angle would have been better. Keys are quiet. Can't say about durability or battery life as not had long enough
customer_reviews.author: Trance

customer_reviews.title: Computer techy since 70's. Bought this so as not ...
customer_reviews.text: Computer techy since 70's. Bought this so as not have to take k480 to hospital as I lost two bluetooth portable keyboards to age. Device is well made. I use it daily on my desktop win10, Samsung Tab A, Galaxy S5. As stated numbers are a bit small as the top row keys are multifunction for different devices as outlined in the ops manual which is provided under the keyboard. Another advantage is it is small enough to allow my cats to have room on the tabletop. Battledoc.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is a welcome solution to my husband's problem of the touchscreen keyboard on his phone being too small. I also like it for myself since I am much faster typing on an actual keyboard than I am on the touchscreen keyboard on my phone. Nice product. Decent battery life. Easy to use. My only complain would be that the backspace button isn't as wide as on a standard keyboard so I often hit the wrong key there, but it is a small inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L

customer_reviews.title: Great for its Price, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: great angle to use as a laptop, not so much for writing on with an apple pen. I had to tap the backspace harder than usual for it to recognize; other keys were fine. This keyboard does click clacks when I hit the keys, which I prefer (not silent). Takes about 3 seconds to turn on and auto connect via Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: John Pham

customer_reviews.title: Small but not too small. Right size and perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item twice. Very satisfied. Easy to use. I added language stickers to one of them even at it’s defiantly a nice addition to our tablets. Instead of getting a computer for each kid while they are still young I believe this is a great solution
customer_reviews.author: L.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Design!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little keyboard. It is very compact yet quickly unfolds to a handy little device that easily synced with both my iPad and iPhone, provides a very good and sturdy support for both devices, and worked very well. You just need to be sure to set it up for IOS or Windows or Android (you just need to push the Fn key with either the Q, W, or E button). You should be good-to-go within a few seconds of opening the package. Nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Scelfo

customer_reviews.title: would give 5 stars ...
customer_reviews.text: Would give this a 5 star if it weren't for the horrible stench!! I cant open this in the classroom without people noticing. It smells like fish no matter how much I spray, wipe, etc. To the keys. Nothing helps. Buy at your own risk
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Let me start with the fact that the package arrived super early which impressed me a lot. I like the cover, looks of good quality to me and looks as well classy. As I do lots of short travels it is a very convenient option for me to take when I want to travel light, it literally solves my daily problems. It is compact but i can type very well, the letters are pretty spaced for me. So far I am in love with it. Got as well extended warranty for it. Hoping to use it for a very extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Inna Ravliuc

customer_reviews.title: I like this so much I got one for a friend
customer_reviews.text: I like this so much I got one for a friend. I really like that you can fold the backrest two different ways to fit the type of phone you have....making a hole for a curved back or making a flat surface for phone with flat back. The keys are very responsive and the magnetic cover snaps close with a firmness you can depend on. Also, the keyboard is magnetically attached to the cover which holds it very securely. Holds a charge for a long time and connects with bluetooth on my iPhone 6 quickly.
customer_reviews.author: C. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Works great but not the best option for your lap
customer_reviews.text: Nice and lightweight but pretty sturdy. I had no problems connecting it to my tablet via bluetooth, and it works with nearly any size device. I've used it with my phone as well as my 9" tablet. The one minor downside is that it requires a reasonably flat surface, it doesn't work to put it in my lap because the part of the stand that rests on the table is quite narrow and falls between my legs when I try to set it on my lap.
customer_reviews.author: aleta d.

customer_reviews.title: Compact, easy to set up and works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great comoact keyboard, Perfectly suites for my Android tablet and iPad. The switch between the OS' is seamless . It was easy to set up and i was up an running in a minute. The size and weight of this keyboard makes this great for carrying along. I haven't had a chance to test out the battery yet, but I am sure it will be great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tirthankar Chakraborty

customer_reviews.title: This keyboard is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is awesome... it holds the iPad, works immediately with no lag time. It sets flat and is easy to type on. I really like this keyboard. The only change I would make is that you could sync more than one iPad to it instead of having to sync each time you switch.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: The positive reviews must be some kind of joke. This thing is such a cheap piece of garbage. Looks and feels like the cheapest keyboard I have ever. The function key was looking at me at a 45 degree angle when I opened the box. That’s when I knew. 2 stars for having keys and being cheap but I’m sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Handy lil thang
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard was the best thing I found for my tablet and phone, too. It has really good battery life, all the usual shortcuts work and it feels great to type on, too. A decent buy and great thing for tablet users, or anything that you can type on.
customer_reviews.author: Shema

customer_reviews.title: won't pair
customer_reviews.text: I used it for about a week and now I can't pair it with anything!!!! First impression: pretty good, but fingers cramped on small keyboard. Also nothing to raise angle of keyboard for typing. Actually keyboard is highest closest to bottom because of the ipad stand folded under. I'm not using an ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Persey

customer_reviews.title: Enough click for my preference
customer_reviews.text: I use this keyboard all day as I’m a nurse in the field. It’s small enough and thin enough to fit in my purse. Very lightweight. The cover protects the keyboard. And holds the tablet. They keys are large enough for typing accuracy. Enough “click” for my preference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... the numbers worked right on the bluetooth part its great. am using it right now to wirte this
customer_reviews.text: at 1st it was little crazy getting to work but after the numbers worked right on the bluetooth part its great. am using it right now to wirte this. its so much better to use the keyboard then trying to use the tablet. my tablet i can use the cable if i would like so i do not have to use the bluetooth part. when the keyboard is low on battery i can still use it thats a other thing i love about it
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Already Not Working
customer_reviews.text: I saw a few other reviews saying theirs quickly died. Mine did the same. Worked great for a few weeks, then suddenly dead. Probably broke during the return period, even, but I didn't get around to returning it as soon as it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan K.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this keyboard instead of overpriced one from apple
customer_reviews.text: Such a good keyboard for the price! I bought it for my iPad Air 3, and the compatibility is flawless. I started using the keyboard in October and still have not needed to charge it (context: I'm a grad school student and will have keyboard on for 3+ hours when writing papers). Connectivity is good too, you just need to give it a few seconds. It does go into sleep mode when it's not in use for some time (I'd estimate 2-5 minutes of no typing), but this is not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Great Products
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this Bluetooth keyboard for my tablet, the keyboard is great, I love it, very good design, very elegant, it also has a very elegant case. I really highly recommend this keyboard, buy it with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy Rivas

product_meta.title: Nulaxy Rechargeable Bluetooth Keyboard with Magnetic Detachable Leather Cover, Ultra-slim Portable Keyboard for iPad iPhone Apple Phone Samsung Tablets-KM12 Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThis is a highest genuine standard keyboard case in the market with fashion and slim design. It is specially designed for business users who travel a lot with Bluetooth enabled tablets and smart phones, running iOS, Windows or Android. You can press "Fn + Q (Android)" or "Fn + W (Windows)" or "Fn + E (iOS)" to switch operating system. With the special stand, you can adjust your tablet or other devices to enjoy easy and comfortable typing and viewing experience.
feature_bullets: Bluetooth Keyboard with Detachable Leather Cover: The keyboard cover is magnetic and detachable. You can use it to phone, iPad, iPhone, Samsung for stand. Friendly protect the keyboard when it is put inside the backpack or bags

Universal Compatibility: The keyboard is wide compatible for Tablet, iPad, iPhone, Phone, iPad Pro, Air, Mini, Samsung Galaxy Tab, Google Nexus, Kindle Fire HD and ALL OF BLUETOOTH DEVICE. It is also compatible for Android, Window, IOS system

Rechargeable Bluetooth Keyboard: The battery is rechargeable and life is longevity, keep 60 days for charging once. It's also intelligence, it will automatically enter sleep mode if you keep it 15 minutes inactive, and wake it up by press any keys

Portable and Ultra-thin Keyboard: Low profile keys create a quiet typing experience, avoiding bother others. This keyboard is ultra thin, up to 10mm and it is small, so it is the best partner for business and travel

Reliable Connection and Precise Transmission: It provides reliable connection and precise transmission. It never happen broke connection or transmission delay, providing high efficient and comfortable typing experience.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,288 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
